extendedInfo.description: *THIS IS A UCCW SKIN - YOU MUST HAVE UCCW APP INSTALLED ON YOUR DEVICE ALREADY (Free)*https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=in.vineetsirohi.customwidget&hl=en*IF YOU'RE USING ANDROID 4.1+ (Jelly Bean) & SKIN DOESN'T SHOW UP, PLEASE EMAIL ME*To use this skin once it's installed, open it from your App Drawer and you'll be prompted by UCCW asking if you want to install the skin. Once you do install the skin the icon from your App Drawer will go away. Then simply add a UCCW widget to your homescreen and the skin will show in the populated list. Resize to your liking and enjoy! FEATURES:TimeCurrent WeatherNext Day ForecastMissed Call CountNew SMS CountNew Gmail Count (Within the UCCW App, you'll need to specify the Gmail account you want displayed)Next Alarm TimeHOTSPOTS: (You should be able to change these to your preferences)Upper Left Corner: Stock Clock AppUpper Right Corner: OPENWeather Bar: AccuWeather Lite (Free in the Play Store)Please email if you have any questions or issues with this skin.

reviews.title: Confused and disappointed

reviews.title: Nice Skin
reviews.comment: This is a very nice skin. It has a lot of functionality and is very pleasing to the eye. I installed it with no problem. I had a minor glitch getting it work, but I emailed the devolper and he responded promptly and the problem was solved. I would recommend this skin to anyone that loves to theme their phone.
